definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Bull Market Correcting or Bear Returning?
sentences.chinese: 此际是牛市调整或是熊市回头？

sentences.english: Yet there may be another supercycle emerging – that is, for gold.
sentences.chinese: 而另一场大牛市可能正在浮出水面，那就是黄金。

sentences.english: Of course, for every China bull, there is a bear.
sentences.chinese: 当然，每一个中国牛市，都会有一个熊市伴随。

sentences.english: The long-term bull market trendline drawn from 2001 has remained intact.
sentences.chinese: 从2001年起画出的长期牛市趋势一直保持不变。

sentences.english: Fibonacci jumped into the technical mainstream late in thebullmarket.
sentences.chinese: 菲波纳奇在牛市的后期一跃而成为技术主流。

sentences.english: The bull market will end-----but when is the question.
sentences.chinese: 牛市将会结束，问题是何时结束。

sentences.english: Was a gaur expert, but ultimately was killed in a fight with a bull gaur .
sentences.chinese: 戈尔是一个专家，但最终被打死在打击牛市戈尔。

sentences.english: The last bull market in gold tested its admirers too.
sentences.chinese: 上一轮黄金牛市也曾对其崇拜者进行过考验。

sentences.english: The harami pattern established on Fri and has now been confirmed today as a bullish reversal.
sentences.chinese: 上周5建立的孕育形态现在已经证明是一个牛市反转。

sentences.english: After a five-year-long bear market, the bull market shouldn't end that fast.
sentences.chinese: 五年之久的熊市之后，牛市的结束应该不会这么快。

sentences.english: The stampeding bull market in commodities has investors reaching for new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 踩的牛市是在商品投资者已达成新的想法。
长期存在的牛市出现崩溃。

sentences.english: Has the adviser performed well in bull and bear markets?
sentences.chinese: 这位顾问是否在牛市和熊市都表现出色？

sentences.english: Remember that the last great bull market ran for almost 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 要记得，上一次大牛市持续了几乎20年。

sentences.english: Analysts say that a long-running bull market didn't begin again until 1942.
sentences.chinese: 分析师们说，长期牛市直到1942年才开始。

sentences.english: Our guess is that this bull market in gold will test its admirers too.
sentences.chinese: 我们的估计是，目前的黄金牛市也将考验其崇拜者。

definition: market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
